entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 12:35 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with ice pellets in the evening. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
